translation.en: [panting] I'm on the surface. I'm on the surface.
translation.ja: 地上だわ　ここは地上よ

translation.en: [yells] The sun! I looked at the sun! I'll go blind!
translation.ja: 太陽を見ちゃった！ 目が見えなくなるわ

translation.en: Wait, I can still see.
translation.ja: あれ？　まだ見える

translation.en: [exclaims] I can't be here. I can't be here. I can't be here.
translation.ja: こんな所に いられないわ

translation.en: Out of my way, rocks!
translation.ja: お願いよ　ここを通して

translation.en: Dad! Can you hear me?
translation.ja: パパ！　私の声が聞こえる？

translation.en: [sighs] Of course not. He could be miles away.
translation.ja: 無理よね きっと遠くにいる

translation.en: OK. [inhales sharply] You can do this, Kipo. You got this.
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)よ キポ あなたならできる

translation.en: Humans lived on the surface for thousands of years.
translation.ja: 人は何千年も地上にいたのよ

translation.en: You can handle a few minutes up here.
translation.ja: 数分くらい何とかなるわ

translation.en: You just have to find your way home.
translation.ja: 帰る方法を探そう

translation.en: Flowers.
translation.ja: 花だわ

translation.en: A lot bigger than they are in books.
translation.ja: 本で見たのより 大きいけど

translation.en: ♪ Up on top, on my own ♪
translation.ja: 地上で 独りぼっち

translation.en: ♪ A human girl so far from home ♪
translation.ja: 遠い所から来た 　　　人間の女の子

translation.en: ♪ The flowers are big ♪ ♪ The bees are weird ♪
translation.ja: 花は大きいし 　　おかしなミツバチがいる

translation.en: ♪ It's dangerous ♪
translation.ja: ここは危険よ

translation.en: ♪ Just like I feared ♪
translation.ja: 恐(おそ)れていたとおりだわ

translation.en: ♪ On the surface world ♪
translation.ja: 地上の世界で…

translation.en: Stay away!
translation.ja: 来ないで！

translation.en: Hmm... Let's see, the current took me left, then right.
translation.ja: まず左に流されて それから右

translation.en: And then there was the long part.
translation.ja: しばらく流されて…

translation.en: [stammering] And the... And the short part.
translation.ja: 少し下がったわ

translation.en: And then the loop-dee-do.
translation.ja: 回転して…

translation.en: And then I went way over here, so, my home must be in this direction.
translation.ja: ここまで来たから こっちに行けば戻(もど)れるはず

translation.en: Or was it left, then loop-dee-do?
translation.ja: 回転の前に左へ行ったかな

translation.en: Or... or... loop-dee-do, then left?
translation.ja: それとも回転した後に 左だっけ？

translation.en: [gasps] Who are you, little one? You're adorable.
translation.ja: あなたは誰(だれ)？　かわいいわね

translation.en: Uh, sorry. Didn't expect you to come with extra eyes.
translation.ja: ごめんね 目が４つあるとは思わなくて

translation.en: I'm a friend.
translation.ja: 私は友達よ

translation.en: Oh! You come with an extra pair of everything!
translation.ja: 脚(あし)も１組 多いのね

translation.en: I only have two legs. So boring.
translation.ja: 私は２本しかないわ

translation.en: -I have to pet you. -[squealing]
translation.ja: 飼いたい

translation.en: [Kipo] Wait! Come back!
translation.ja: 行かないで

translation.en: You can run, pig. But I will find you, and I will pet you.
translation.ja: 逃(に)げてもムダよ ペットにするんだから

translation.en: I somehow feel like I've been wearing you my whole life.
translation.ja: これが しっくりくるわ

translation.en: Piggy!
translation.ja: ブタちゃん！

translation.en: I can help you with that.
translation.ja: 私に任せて

translation.en: We have vending machines like this in my burrow. I know all the tricks.
translation.ja: 地下にも こういう自販機(じはんき)があるの

translation.en: There's a wire back here. If I could just get to it.
translation.ja: 後ろに電源があるはず 届くかな…

translation.en: That works, too.
translation.ja: これも ありね

translation.en: Whoa! You were hungry, weren't you?
translation.ja: おなか すいてたの？

translation.en: Hey, wanna try something fun?
translation.ja: ねえ　楽しいことする？

translation.en: You ready?
translation.ja: いい？

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.ja: ヤッホー！

translation.en: Humans from the old world. This is a school!
translation.ja: 昔の世界の人間ね　学校だわ

translation.en: I go to school, too. Underground with lots of other kids.
translation.ja: 私も地下で 学校に行ってるのよ

translation.en: No windows, though. My father teaches there.
translation.ja: パパは学校の先生なの

translation.en: "Kipo, how many light years are in a parsec?"
translation.ja: “１パーセクは 何光年かな？”

translation.en: Although, a lot of good that does me up here.
translation.ja: でも この世界も悪くないわ

translation.en: My whole life they taught us the surface was this horrible place.
translation.ja: 地上はひどい場所だと 教えられたけど

translation.en: -But look at you. -[snorting] You look just like these dumplings my dad makes.
translation.ja: あなたって パパが作るギョウザに似てる

translation.en: They're called "mandu."
translation.ja: “マンドゥ”よ

translation.en: [gasps] That's it! I'm gonna call you "Mandu."
translation.ja: あなたの名前にしましょ

translation.en: I'm gonna get you! -[squealing] -I'm gonna get you, Mandu!
translation.ja: 追いかけっこね 捕(つか)まえてあげる

translation.en: Mandu, I have to pet this bunny, now.
translation.ja: マンドゥ このウサギも飼うわ

translation.en: It's gonna be OK.
translation.ja: 心配しないで

translation.en: Hi, there. Aren't you fluffy.
translation.ja: こんにちは　フワフワね

translation.en: Oh, you like that.
translation.ja: 人なつこい

translation.en: Oh! There's another one.
translation.ja: 他にも いたのね

translation.en: OK, OK! Everyone wait your turn. You're all so soft, but there's only one of me.
translation.ja: 押(お)さないで 順番に なでてあげるから

translation.en: And that must be the mother.
translation.ja: ひょっとして 母ウサギかしら

translation.en: Mandu!
translation.ja: マンドゥ！

translation.en: Mandu!
translation.ja: マンドゥ！

translation.en: Can you talk, mute?
translation.ja: 話せるの？

translation.en: I'm no barbarian. If a mute can talk, it's not chow.
translation.ja: 言葉を話すミュートは 食べない

translation.en: All I need to hear is one little "yes."
translation.ja: 話せるなら返事をして

translation.en: -[squeals] -A human?
translation.ja: 人間かしら？

translation.en: Sorry, but a girl's gotta eat.
translation.ja: 悪いけど食べるよ

translation.en: I was wondering when you were gonna come out of there.
translation.ja: 出てくるのを待ってた

translation.en: You're human! On the surface.
translation.ja: あなた 地上に住む人間なのね

translation.en: You don't miss a thing, do you?
translation.ja: 何か捜(さが)してるの？

translation.en: -[Mandu squealing] -[gasps] Wait. You can't eat my friend.
translation.ja: その子は友達よ

translation.en: If you want a bacon sandwich, go catch your own pig. I already called dibs on this one.
translation.ja: サンドイッチが食べたければ 自分で捕(つか)まえて

translation.en: -Mandu is no sandwich! -She's about to be.
translation.ja: サンドイッチ？ 材料にする

translation.en: [gasps] Say, your staff is so pointy.
translation.ja: これ すごくとがってるね どこで見つけたの？

translation.en: -Where'd you get it from? -Off a giant scorpion.
translation.ja: これ すごくとがってるね どこで見つけたの？ 巨大(きょだい)サソリから もぎ取ったの

translation.en: It was trespassing in my camp.
translation.ja: 巨大(きょだい)サソリから もぎ取ったの

translation.en: -[squealing] -Oh, no, you don't!
translation.ja: 逃(に)がさないよ

translation.en: -Hey! Run, Mandu! -Let go!
translation.ja: 逃(に)げて！ 放してよ！

translation.en: What is wrong with you? Now we're both out of a meal.
translation.ja: どういうつもり？ 食べ物を逃(のが)したじゃない

translation.en: How can you eat her? She's adorable!
translation.ja: あんな かわいい子を 食べるなんて

translation.en: I've eaten plenty of adorable. And there's lots more adorable that's tried to eat me.
translation.ja: 食べ物に かわいさは関係ないの

translation.en: Do you have any hand sanitizer?
translation.ja: 除菌剤(じょきんざい) 持ってる？

translation.en: You must not be from around here. Are you one of those underground mole people?
translation.ja: ここらの者じゃないね 穴ぐらに暮らしてる奴(やつ)？

translation.en: You've heard of us! I didn't think there were any humans left up here anymore.
translation.ja: もう地上に 人は いないと思ってた

translation.en: For your lost lunch.
translation.ja: 食べていいよ

translation.en: Listen, I'm trying to find my way home.
translation.ja: 帰る方法を探してるの

translation.en: You clearly look like you grew up around here.
translation.ja: あなたは ここに詳(くわ)しそうね

translation.en: Maybe you could help me find...
translation.ja: 手伝ってもらえたら…

translation.en: it.
translation.ja: うれしい

translation.en: [grunting] Kipo. My name's Kipo.
translation.ja: 私の名前はキポよ

translation.en: And... and I really need your help right now.
translation.ja: すごく困ってるの

translation.en: You're not gone? That's annoying.
translation.ja: ついてこないで　迷惑(めいわく)よ

translation.en: Look, there was a mute-quake. A lot of people I care about could be hurt.
translation.ja: ミュートがやってきて 大変だったから心配なの

translation.en: I really need to get home.
translation.ja: 早く帰らないと

translation.en: Not my problem.
translation.ja: 私に関係ない

translation.en: Hey. Hey!
translation.ja: ちょっと ねえ！

translation.en: First lesson of the surface: Up here, you don't shout like that.
translation.ja: 地上の掟(おきて) その１ 大きな声で叫(さけ)ばない

translation.en: It's called "ringing the dinner bell." Free advice.
translation.ja: 食べられたくなかったらね

translation.en: Hey, you, wolf girl!
translation.ja: 待って オオカミ少女！

translation.en: Yeah! You, walking away from me!
translation.ja: あなたを呼んでるの

translation.en: I'm still talking to you!
translation.ja: 話は終わってないわ

translation.en: Fine. I don't need you anyway.
translation.ja: いいわ　もう頼(たの)まない

translation.en: Oh, hi. You look friendly.
translation.ja: あら　こんにちは 親切そうね

translation.en: That's your last freebie.
translation.ja: 助けるのは これが最後

translation.en: Fine. I'll just go this way instead.
translation.ja: じゃあ行くわね

translation.en: Really? You're just gonna walk right into Death Ivy?
translation.ja: 本気なの？ そっちは“死のツタ”よ

translation.en: [groans] You're not gonna last five minutes.
translation.ja: １人では無理そうね

translation.en: Look, I'll help you get home.
translation.ja: 手伝ってあげる

translation.en: But once you're back, I'm out.
translation.ja: でも地下に戻(もど)ったら もう私に関わらないで

translation.en: -Up here, I work alone. Got it? -Oh, thank you!
translation.ja: でも地下に戻(もど)ったら もう私に関わらないで ありがと

translation.en: No hugging.
translation.ja: 触(さわ)らないで

translation.en: I knew you were a good person.
translation.ja: いい人だと思ってた

translation.en: Hey, I just realized I don't know your name.
translation.ja: ねえ 名前を教えて

translation.en: -No talking! -Uh, OK.
translation.ja: 話す気はない じゃあウルフって呼ぶよ そう考えてたんだ

translation.en: I'll just call you "Wolf", then. I've already been calling you that in my head.
translation.ja: じゃあウルフって呼ぶよ そう考えてたんだ

translation.en: At first we thought it was a mute passing overhead. I mean, that happens all the time, right?
translation.ja: いつも備えは万全だったのよ

translation.en: We learned a long time ago to anchor all tall furniture.
translation.ja: 家具も固定してたし

translation.en: But this one was, like, an earthquake. I can't imagine how big it was.
translation.ja: でも今回は 本物の地震(じしん)みたいだった

translation.en: It made an entire cliff fall... while I was on it.
translation.ja: 崖(がけ)全体が崩(くず)れて真っ逆さま

translation.en: And then, I landed in the water supply tube and nearly drowned.
translation.ja: 配水管に落ちて溺(おぼ)れかけたの

translation.en: [gulps] Sounds like a Tuesday. Listen, Kipo, was it?
translation.ja: おしゃべりだね　よく聞いて

translation.en: Lesson two of the surface: Don't ever tell anyone that story.
translation.ja: 地上の掟(おきて) その２ 地下の話はダメ

translation.en: It could be very dangerous if people know you're from a burrow.
translation.ja: 地下の人間は狙(ねら)われるから

translation.en: And lesson three of the surface: Up here, you never pass up a meal.
translation.ja: 地上の掟(おきて) その３ 食事は絶対に逃(のが)さない

translation.en: Crispy on the outside, chewy in the center.
translation.ja: 中は歯応えがあるね

translation.en: Can you tell me anything about your burrow that might help us find it?
translation.ja: 場所の手がかりは？

translation.en: Oh, well, there's the underground irrigation system...
translation.ja: 水を引くシステムがあるわ

translation.en: which is underground.
translation.ja: 地下の地下にね

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, wait! The Clover!
translation.ja: そうだ　クローバーがある

translation.en: How could I forget the Clover? We live under this barrier called The Great Clover.
translation.ja: “クローバー”と呼ばれる バリアーに包まれてて

translation.en: I've never actually seen it, but we use it as our city emblem.
translation.ja: 街のシンボルになってるの

translation.en: Hmm. I may know what that is.
translation.ja: 見たことがあるかも

translation.en: We'll make camp here for the night.
translation.ja: ここで寝(ね)よう

translation.en: For the night... out here?
translation.ja: 外でひと晩 過ごすの？

translation.en: Uh, my dad must be really worried about me right now, so...
translation.ja: 今頃(いまごろ) パパが 心配してるだろうから…

translation.en: Uh, did you hear that? Because I definitely did. It feels like something we should worry about.
translation.ja: 今の聞こえた？ 何か危険が迫(せま)ってるのかも

translation.en: So many sparkles! I was not prepared.
translation.ja: 星空がキラキラ輝(かがや)いてる！ ビックリしちゃった

translation.en: Why would humans stay underground when every night they could look up and see this?
translation.ja: 地下の人間は これが見られなくて残念だね

translation.en: Yeah, it's a real paradise.
translation.ja: そんなに はしゃぐほどのこと？

translation.en: That must be the Big Dipper! It's part of Ursa Major.
translation.ja: 北斗七星(ほくとしちせい)だ！　おおぐま座も

translation.en: I'm kind of an astronomy buff even though I've never seen a sky before.
translation.ja: 地下は空がないのに 天文学が好きなの

translation.en: Ooh! And that bright one, that's Polaris!
translation.ja: あの明るい星は北極星よ！

translation.en: You see the one that doesn't make any noise?
translation.ja: 静かにしてくれる？

translation.en: Well, none of them make... Oh.
translation.ja: それに どの星も…

translation.en: [chuckles nervously] OK. I'll be quiet. You get sleep.
translation.ja: 分かった もう黙(だま)るから眠(ねむ)って

translation.en: [gasps] Aries! That's my birth sign. I've always wanted to see it!
translation.ja: おひつじ座よ！ 私の星座なの

translation.en: It's supposed to be a ram if you connect the dots. I guess you can kinda see it if you squint right--
translation.ja: 点をつなぐと ヒツジの形になるはず

translation.en: -[Wolf] Kipo! -Oh, right.
translation.ja: キポ！ ごめん

translation.en: Anything that looks useful, take.
translation.ja: 役に立ちそうな物は取って

translation.en: "October 23rd, 2020."
Yeah, it's expired by about 200 years.
translation.ja: 約200年前に 賞味期限が切れてる

translation.en: -Found it! -Spot remover?
translation.ja: あった！ シャツのシミを抜(ぬ)くやつ？

translation.en: That's for getting out shirt stains.
translation.ja: シャツのシミを抜(ぬ)くやつ？

translation.en: No offense, yours may need a full spin cycle.
translation.ja: その服 洗濯(せんたく)が必要よね

translation.en: Mega Bunny. It's a good thing we're inside-- [yells]
translation.ja: メガ･バニーかも

translation.en: -Whoa! -Definitely a Mega Bunny.
translation.ja: やっぱりね

translation.en: I saw that same Mega Bunny earlier.
translation.ja: 昨日も見たわ

translation.en: I named her "Rabbecka." The little ones are so cuddly!
translation.ja: 子ウサギたちが かわいいの

translation.en: You touched the babies?
translation.ja: まさか触(さわ)ったの？

translation.en: Why did you touch the babies? Don't you know you can't touch the babies?!
translation.ja: なんで子ウサギに 触(さわ)ったりしたのよ

translation.en: But they were so cute. [yells]
translation.ja: かわいくて つい

translation.en: Aisle six, baking goods. Aisle seven, drinks.
translation.ja: ６番通路の次が７番通路で…

translation.en: Aisle eight, bingo!
translation.ja: ８番通路に…　あった！

translation.en: Pretty sure you got the baby scent off me.
translation.ja: もう においは消えたよ

translation.en: You can't be too careful.
translation.ja: しっかり消さないと

translation.en: Huh? Oh, all out.
translation.ja: なくなった

translation.en: Oh, thank goodness!
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: It's a good thing I found this second bottle.
translation.ja: もう１本 探(さが)さなきゃ

translation.en: [groans] You've gotta be kidding me!
translation.ja: もう十分でしょ

translation.en: -[coughing] -This one's Summer Rain.
translation.ja: ここが“サマー･レイン”よ

translation.en: That is way better than taking the stairs!
translation.ja: 階段を上るより早いね

translation.en: If you run into anything, act like you're from the surface.
translation.ja: 何か現れたら 地上人のフリをして

translation.en: From the surface. Got it.
translation.ja: 地上人ね　分かった

translation.en: Uh, what are you doing?
translation.ja: 何のマネ？

translation.en: [deep voice] I'm from the surface, where life is hard.
translation.ja: 私は険しい地上の民だ

translation.en: You gotta be tough as nails.
translation.ja: 鉄のように 強いハートを持ち―

translation.en: Iron and fire... wearing dead animals.
translation.ja: 鉄のように 強いハートを持ち― 毛皮を着る

translation.en: Good. You're catching on.
translation.ja: よし　その調子

translation.en: This is my angry surface face.
translation.ja: これが私の地上の顔よ

translation.en: Hmm. [normal voice] Whoa, what's that?
translation.ja: あれ 何？

translation.en: [gasps] There's so much to see when you're not in a cave!
translation.ja: 地下では見られない景色だわ

translation.en: Focus, Kipo.
translation.ja: こっちよ

translation.en: [Kipo gasps] That must be it! It looks just like the clover in our emblem.
translation.ja: あれだわ！ 街のシンボルと同じ形だもの

translation.en: Wow. So, that's my home.
translation.ja: 地下の街 あれが私の家よ

translation.en: It's half a day's walk from here, but we'll have to get over Skyscraper Ridge.
translation.ja: 歩いて半日だけど 超高層(ちょうこうそう)ビルを越(こ)えなきゃ

translation.en: -[Kipo] That looks dangerous. -[Wolf] It is.
translation.ja: 危険そうね そうよ

translation.en: I'm really sticking my neck out for you. And for what?
translation.ja: なぜ あなたのために 私まで危険な目に？

translation.en: I wish I knew how to repay you.
translation.ja: お礼をしたいけど

translation.en: Or if you wanted to come stay with me, I'm sure there'd be a place for you in my burrow.
translation.ja: もしよかったら 私の家で一緒(いっしょ)に暮らさない？

translation.en: And go all soft and mushy like the rest of you mole people?
translation.ja: 穴ぐらで のんびり暮らせって？

translation.en: No, thanks.
translation.ja: 断るわ

translation.en: Humans.
translation.ja: 人間どもか

translation.en: [gasps] My shirt!
translation.ja: シャツが！

translation.en: [pants] It won't come out! [groaning] It's setting!
translation.ja: 汚(よご)れてしまった もう落ちない！

translation.en: [panting] Careful! That's one of the Mod Frogs. You do not wanna mess with them.
translation.ja: 気をつけて しゃれこんだカエルよ

translation.en: You're a talking frog!
translation.ja: 言葉を話すカエル！

translation.en: I mean, I've seen tons of talking frogs before...
translation.ja: つまり その… スーツを着て話すカエルは たくさん見たわ

translation.en: that wear suits.
translation.ja: スーツを着て話すカエルは たくさん見たわ

translation.en: No... No biggie.
translation.ja: 普通(ふつう)よね

translation.en: What my friend here means to say is, we have this!
translation.ja: つまり私たちには これが あるってこと

translation.en: Spot remover! Give it to me!
translation.ja: シミ抜(ぬ)き剤(ざい)！ それをよこせ！

translation.en: If you let us go.
translation.ja: 逃(に)がしてくれるならね

translation.en: [gasps] Look, this is my private office.
translation.ja: ここは私のオフィスだ

translation.en: Was there an "enjoy the view" sign on my door? I think not.
translation.ja: “展望室”とは どこにも書いてないだろう？

translation.en: We're Mega Bunny hunters. We were just scouting.
translation.ja: こっちは メガ･バニー狩(が)りの途中(とちゅう)なの

translation.en: [groans] Just give me the spot remover. Then I'll decide what to do with you.
translation.ja: シミ抜(ぬ)き剤(ざい)をよこせ 話はそれからだ

translation.en: [shrieking] Oh, thank... Huh?
translation.ja: 助かった…

translation.en: Mega Bunny hunters. Right.
translation.ja: メガ･バニー狩(か)りだと？

translation.en: Looked more like a burrow girl to me.
translation.ja: 地下の奴(やつ)に見えたがな

translation.en: [sighs] This does not get old.
translation.ja: 星空は見飽(みあ)きないな

translation.en: Lesson five on the surface: Looking up... gets you killed.
translation.ja: 地上の掟(おきて) その５ 上を見てたら殺される

translation.en: [gasps] Mandu! You came back! Here, girl!
translation.ja: マンドゥ！　戻(もど)ってきたのね

translation.en: Something's wrong.
translation.ja: 様子が変よ

translation.en: Yeah, you're pointing a nightmare stick at a tiny pig. How do you expect the poor thing to react?
translation.ja: 武器を向けたら おびえるに決まってるでしょ

translation.en: I'm not the one who spooked her.
translation.ja: あれのせいね

translation.en: Oh, burrow girl! I figured out where you're from.
translation.ja: 出てこい　人間 お前の故郷が分かったぞ

translation.en: Shocker... a burrow!
translation.ja: なんと地下の世界だ！

translation.en: You could lead us to the mother lode of humans.
translation.ja: 人間の宝庫に 案内してもらおう

translation.en: [frog] Ah, just a pig.
translation.ja: ブタか

translation.en: -[gasps] -[frog] Eh, at least now we have a snack.
translation.ja: おやつだな

translation.en: -No. -[squealing]
translation.ja: ダメ

translation.en: I won't let them take her.
translation.ja: 助けなきゃ

translation.en: And risk our necks for a mute? See, this is why I work alone.
translation.ja: ミュートのために 危険を冒(おか)す気？

translation.en: If you like to be alone so bad, maybe you should be.
translation.ja: 自分だけ逃(に)げるなら どうぞ

translation.en: Put the pig down right now!
translation.ja: その子を放して！

translation.en: Burrow girl, there you are.
translation.ja: やっと現れたな

translation.en: Uh... That pig is a bloodthirsty killer.
translation.ja: そのブタは凶悪(きょうあく)な殺し屋よ

translation.en: -She'll tear you limb from limb. -Mm, yeah. I'll take my chances.
translation.ja: バラバラにされたい？ そうだな　覚悟(かくご)しよう

translation.en: Wolf! You came back!
translation.ja: 戻(もど)ってくれたのね

translation.en: Yep.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: [gasps] Is he dead?
translation.ja: 死んだ？

translation.en: No, but when he wakes up, he'll have a bad headache...
translation.ja: いいや 頭痛は残ると思うけど

translation.en: and possibly some memory loss.
translation.ja: 記憶(きおく)も失うかもね

translation.en: We'll hole up here.
translation.ja: ここに隠(かく)れよう

translation.en: [grunts] Normally, at night, I'd be at home doing my homework.
translation.ja: いつもだったら 家で宿題をしてる時間よ

translation.en: Eating a muffin. Not running away from homicidal frogs!
translation.ja: カエルから逃(に)げることなんて ないわ！

translation.en: [frog] Oh... Oh, my head.
translation.ja: ひどい頭痛がする

translation.en: I... Wait a minute, why are you following me?
translation.ja: ひどい頭痛がする なんでついてくるんだ？

translation.en: [henchman] Uh, Jamack, we're looking for those humans.
translation.ja: 人間を捜(さが)してただろ ジャマック

translation.en: [Jamack] Oh, yeah, right. Yeah, just... duh.
translation.ja: そういえば そうだった それでは捜索(そうさく)を再開しよう

translation.en: Let's... let's get back to that then.
translation.ja: それでは捜索(そうさく)を再開しよう

translation.en: Since we've had our first fight and makeup,
translation.ja: ケンカして仲直りしたから もう親友だね

translation.en: that makes us officially sisters.
translation.ja: ケンカして仲直りしたから もう親友だね やめて

translation.en: -Don't. -Uh, right.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: [gasps] There's a baby here. Why is there a baby here?
translation.ja: こんな所に赤ちゃんが？

translation.en: We have to shut that thing up.
translation.ja: 黙(だま)らせなくちゃ

translation.en: OK, we really need you to hush, little baby.
translation.ja: お願いだから 泣きやんでちょうだい

translation.en: I'll put him to sleep. There's a slight chance this'll kill him.
translation.ja: 眠(ねむ)らせる 命の保証はないけど

translation.en: Don't you dare!
translation.ja: 絶対にダメ！

translation.en: A mute? You gotta be kidding me!
translation.ja: ミュートだったのね！

translation.en: It's still a baby!
translation.ja: 子供よ

translation.en: [Jamack] Check every room!
translation.ja: 捜(さが)し出せ！

translation.en: Do you know any grub nursery rhymes?
translation.ja: 子守歌を知らない？
